summary: A medieval love story with lots of adventures. The times are troubled - there's a revolt of peasants going on. To secure its safety a monastery chases for a relics of a holy Brigitte. A ... See full summary »
cast: Aleksandr Goloborodko|Igrida Andrina|Elza Radzina|Rolan Bykov|Eve Kivi|Uldis Vazdiks|Raivo Trass|Peeter Jakobi|Karl Kalkun|Guli Khamrayeva|Kalju Komissarov|Ants Lauter|Valdeko Ratassepp|Juri Uppin|Feliks Kark|Hugo Laur|Jüri Järvet|Felix Kark|Rein Noode|Aksel Orav|Priit Pärn|Valdo Truve|Ain Jürisson|Hans Kaldoja|Katrin Karisma|Ago Saller|Helmut Vaag
title: Viimne reliikvia
